about.title: ABOUT
about.content: Developer interested in building and maintaining software. Focused on clean, maintainable, and functional code using standard web technologies.

timeline.title: Front-end Developer at FaceBook
timeline.description: Worked on UI components and improved client-side performance.

timeline.title: UI Developer at GitHub
timeline.description: Developed user interface features and optimized conversion flows.

timeline.title: Illustrator at Google
timeline.description: Designed onboarding illustrations for mobile and web applications.

timeline.title: Full-Stack Developer at CodePen
timeline.description: Built and maintained full-stack features and internal tools.
